evidence.claim: Liken Home Care mentions the use of FHIR standards for health data exchange.
They utilize HL7 protocols to ensure seamless interoperability among health systems.
The company highlights compliance with HIPAA regulations concerning patient data handling.
Their technology infrastructure supports integration with EHR systems through standard transaction sets.
They provide information regarding secure data sharing practices for health information.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of handling X12 transactions or using APIs for healthcare data exchange.
